name: ドドリアン
description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

name: セシリアの花
description: 野外で採集推奨：星拾いの崖で採集モンド城の花屋で購入(毎日5個まで)
sources: Given by an NPC at the top of Starsnatch Cliff
Given by the nun in front of Mondstadt's cathedral

name: 石珀
description: 琉璃の崖で採集推奨：琥牢山で採集

name: 蒲公英の種
description: 野外で採集推奨：モンド城門で採集(青タンポポに風元素をぶつける)

name: 琉璃百合
description: 軽策荘の製粉所で購入(50000モラ)野外で採集推奨：璃月港の玉京台付近で採集推奨：軽策荘で採集
sources: Found in Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

name: 絶雲の唐辛子
description: A spicy plant native to Liyue.Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

name: 夜泊石
description: 璃月の洞窟内で採集推奨：明蘊町で採集(青い鉱石)

name: 慕風のマッシュルーム
description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
sources: Found under the eaves of houses

name: 清心
description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
sources: Found in the heights of stone forests

name: 霓裳花
description: 軽策荘の製粉所で購入(1000モラ)望舒旅館で購入(1000モラ)璃月港の玉京台付近で採集望舒旅館の付近で採集推奨：璃月港で採集
sources: Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

name: イグサ
description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
sources: Found in the wild at night

name: 星螺
sources: Found on the beaches of Liyue
Found on the frigid coastlines of Dragonspine closer to Liyue

name: ヴァルベリー
description: 野外で採集推奨：望風山地で採集クロリスから購入
sources: Found in the wild around Stormbearer Mountains

name: 琉璃袋
description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

name: 風車アスター
description: 風立ちの地の七天神像付近で採集野外の木の下で採集推奨：風龍廃墟で採集モンド城の花屋で購入(毎日5個まで)
sources: Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
Found under trees in the wild

name: ググプラム
description: 野外で採集推奨：奔狼領で採集クロリスから購入
